sector_kpis.kpi_1: EBITDA per Tonne: INR 30,000 - 50,000 (Highly sensitive to LME Aluminium and Alumina prices)
sector_kpis.kpi_2: Capacity Utilization: 101% for Alumina Refinery and ~97% for Aluminium Smelter
sector_kpis.kpi_3: Resource Securitization: 100% captive bauxite mines and increasing captive coal (Utkal D & E)
